thread.title: Denise Crowson
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Denise Crowson

author: Denise Crowson
title: Denise Crowson
text: After searching unsuccessfully for the joules field jacket in navy in my size I came across country attire ltd. I was able to purchase the jacket and from order to delivery was amazed at the speedy delivery. Purchased and delivered within 5 days in perfect condition. Would highly recommend this company and would definitely order again. Thank you.
